title: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog are incorrect.
OB: The label 'Test Classes to be included' is written as TestClasses (missing space). The status line incorrectly refers to methods being selected instead of types. The action name is written as TestSuite instead of Test Suite.
SR: The label 'Test Classes to be included' should be corrected to 'Test Classes to be included'. The status line should be updated to refer to types being selected. The action name should be updated to 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite'.
